import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PatientForm=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[address,setAddress]=useState('');const[phone,setPhone]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const patient={name,address,phone};// here we are sending a post reqst to this url
const response=await fetch('/api/patient',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(patient),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});const json=await response.json();if(!response.ok){setError(json.error);}if(response.ok){setName('');setAddress('');setPhone('');setError(null);console.log('new record added',json);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"create",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add new Entry"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Patient Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),value:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:" Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",onChange:e=>setAddress(e.target.value),value:address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",onChange:e=>setPhone(e.target.value),value:phone}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Add  Patient"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error})]});};export default PatientForm;
